comment.body: There's some work implemented to improve comic book reading. http://127.0.0.1:43110/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post/1MoonP8t4rk9QamBUPh5Aspkwa1Xhf5ux2/1DMTYjzfkFHyB8yZ37sMBuTirTUp5bWLQC/1569791697
If it leaks, don't hold it sideways. Also, why has your house fallen over?

If you like mobile FPS's you should try them clip-on shoulder buttons for touchscreens. Never been much into mFPS's but found a pair of clip-ons for cheap and thought why not give it a go, I love FPS's on the PC.


First time trying PUBG Mobile with shoulder buttons, group MVP. Second time trying PUBG Mobile... Winner Winner, Chicken Dinner. Too OP, like having 100% more thumbs. Tried it without the clip-ons and it was horrible compared to keyboard and mouse. Never played it again.


I still don't like mFPS, but I loved what those shoulder buttons did for the gameplay.

>YouTube is unreliable for income.

Not only because of YT unreliability and the adpocalypse, but more and more people are getting fed up with the amount of ads.

I've used ad-blockers for years and recently watched YT on a computer without and was appalled by the 2x 30sec ads I had to watch. Now that computer has an ad-blocker as well.

More and more YT creators incorporate ads into the video itself, and while some clearly mark it (Lindybeige is a good example), other bake it into their message in such a way that they lose credibility.
